title: Looking for 2-4 gold players to play ranked with.
body:
I'm an ADC main, and can Mid. But looking for everything else pretty much.

Looking for Support Jungle Mid and Top.

Msg me here, don't randomly add me because I won't accept unless you have msged me here first.

I will update post on what has been taken.

Won't be able to communicate because of no mic. But typing + Pinging will be fine. 

If interested. Msg below.

replies.body: im keen i play support IGN DABEEFYWARBOSS
